text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump @AmericaFirstPAC Pathological liar, corrupt criminal #donaldtrump BRAGGED of a final total of 60,000 deaths by August (good news to him). But we have 88,199 deaths today on May 15. Something didn't add up. I don't understand.
#TrumpIsA_DANGER_ToAmerica
#TrumpLiesPeopleDie 
#COVID19

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
